title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, stem, roumanian, and half cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Within a curving border of carnations and tulips two texts, flowers, parents' names and initials.  At bottom large house on lawn with sheep.  This looks like an English prototype of a later Pennsylvania work.
name: Sampler
